data.title: Tom Cruise Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Tom Cruise with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Studied for one year, at age 14, at a Franciscan seminary

Joined the Church of Scientology after its study courses helped him overcome a learning disability

Co-star Paul Newman got him interested in auto racing while filming The Color of Money, and he went on to race on Newman's team

Earned his pilot's license in 1994

First actor to appear in five consecutive movies (A Few Good Men, The Firm, Interview with the Vampire, Mission: Impossible and Jerry Maguire) that grossed more than $100 million at the domestic box office

On the recommendation of his children's orthodontist, got braces to correct his bite at age 39

At the 2005 MTV Movie Awards, received the first-ever MTV Generation Award

Awards

2022Oscar-Best Motion Picture of the Year: nominated

2015Critics' Choice Movie Awards-Best Actor in an Action Movie: nominated

2015Critics' Choice Movie Awards-Best Actor in an Action Movie: nominated

2009Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role in a Motion Picture: nominated

2004Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Motion Picture - Drama: nominated

2000Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role in a Motion Picture: winner

1999Screen Actors Guild Awards-Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture: nominated

1999Chicago Film Critics Association-Best Supporting Actor: winner

1999Oscar-Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role: nominated

1999Screen Actors Guild Awards-Outstanding Performance by a Male Actor in a Supporting Role: nominated

1997Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy: winner

1996Oscar-Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role: nominated

1996National Board of Review-Best Actor: winner

1996Screen Actors Guild Awards-Outstanding Performance by a Male Actor in a Leading Role: nominated

1993Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Motion Picture - Drama: nominated

1991BAFTA Film Awards-Best Actor in a Leading Role: nominated

1990Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Motion Picture - Drama: winner

1989Oscar-Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role: nominated

1984Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actor in a Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy: nominated
